description: TP-LINK Wireless N Powerline Extender TL-WPA281 extends the Internet connection to every room connected to a home’s circuitry. All devices in the room have two options to get access to TL-WPA281, whether through wireless or using an Ethernet cable. With 200Mbps Powerline link rate and 300Mbps wireless N rate, it is ideal for bandwidth consuming or latency sensitive applications like video streaming, online gaming and Internet calls. With TL-WPA281, Internet can now truly be available everywhere in your home or office.
title: TP-LINK TL-WPA281 300Mbps Wireless N Powerline Adapter, 2.4Ghz N300 Adapter, 802.11b/g/n
